ObjectClass.Name: Resource Processor
ObjectClass.Description:
RESOURCE PROCESSOR (RP):
Processes materials: L-Crystals and Q-Plasma
Can convert Q-P into L-C
Can move itself

Objective.Name: Process Resource
Objective.Details: \Process Q-Plasma and L-Crystal\ \For best efficiency limit to 1 RP\ per QP Cell

Objective.Name: QPlasma -> LCrystal and Power
Objective.Details: \Convert 100 Q-Plasma to L-Crystal\after current processing cycle ends\ \ 100 QP = 100 LC + 50 P

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\after current processing cycle ends\ \ Must be near a Teleporter
